TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoggerDescription extends System.Object

summary.span: Contains information about a logger as a collection of values that can be used to instantiate the logger as well as being serialized to pass between different processes.

span.span: Contains information about a logger as a collection of values that can be used to instantiate the logger as well as being serialized to pass between different processes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 클래스 이름 및 어셈블리 이름을 결합 하 여로 거 이름이 생성 됩니다.The logger name is generated by combining its class name and assembly name.
